mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (CART_NO, USER_ID, PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_AMOUNT) VALUES (seq_cart.NEXTVAL, #{user_id}, #{product_no}, #{product_amount})
mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_NO, C.USER_ID, P.PRODUCT_NO, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_URL, C.PRODUCT_AMOUNT, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, (PRODUCT_PRICE * PRODUCT_AMOUNT) MONEY FROM USERS U, PRODUCT P, CART C WHERE U.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND P.PRODUCT_NO = C.PRODUCT_NO AND C.USER_ID = #{user_id} ORDER BY C.CART_NO
SELECT NVL(SUM(PRODUCT_PRICE * PRODUCT_AMOUNT), 0) MONEY FROM CART C, PRODUCT P WHERE C.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO AND C.USER_ID = #{user_id}
